dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1764 IH: Military Food Security Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Panetta (for himself, Mr. Moore of Utah, Ms. Strickland, Mr. Bacon, Ms. Jacobs, Mr. Levin, and Mrs. Rodgers of Washington) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to exclude the basic allowance for housing from the calculation of gross household income for purposes of the basic needs allowance for eligible members of the Armed Forces.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Military Food Security Act of 2023.

section.header: Basic needs allowance: exclusion of basic allowance for housing from the calculation of gross household income of an eligible member of the Armed Forces
section.text: Section 402b(k)(1)(B) of title 37, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking in and all that follows through portion of; and
by striking that the Secretary concerned elects to exclude and inserting paid to such member.
